childMarkdownRemark.html:
Qatar Foundation hosted Viktor Yanukovych, President of the Ukraine, in November 2012.

The Ukrainian President was briefed on Qatar Foundation’s numerous sustainability initiatives and climate action solutions. He was in Doha on a two-day state visit aimed at enhancing bilateral relations, and providing both nations with the opportunity to discuss regional and international issues of mutual concern.

President Yanukovych graduated in 1980 from Donetsk Polytechnic Institute, now known as Donetsk State Technical University, with a major in Mechanical Engineering. He obtained a Master’s degree in International Law from the Ukrainian Academy of Foreign Trade in 2001. Viktor Yanukovych is also a member of the Academy of Economic Sciences of Ukraine, PhD in Economics.
